p: The extraction of the EOOO by hydrodistillation presented a yield of 2.31%, considering the dry weight of the botanical material. Phytochemical analysis of the essential oil through gas chromatography coupled with mass spectrometry (GC-MS) identified 93.1% of the total constituents, revealing the presence of 16 different compounds, including safrole (77.9%), spathulenol (4.0%) and ortho-cymene (3.0%) as major constituents ( Table 1).
